subject: Colleges and Universities
Football

Football (College)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Texas Christian’s decision to join the Big 12 and leave the Big East, which it had yet to join officially, leaves the conference with only six football-playing universities.
snippet: Texas Christian’s decision to join the Big 12 and leave the Big East, which it had yet to join officially, leaves the conference with only six football-playing universities.
